name: Aesthetic Arena
description: Ａｅｓｔｈｅｔｉｃ　Ａｒｅｎａ, is a wave based shooter where the objective is to survive against cars flying toward you in a trippy atmosphere. Your car has broken down and you are stranded in the neon desert. With neon guns, health, ammo, and powerups in your proximity, you are able to shoot enemy's down and have a speed advantage. Enemy's include giant neon spiders and cars. These enemy's will get more numerous, and harder as you progress through the waves. Will you make it out of this hallucination?
